channel.title: unix on I am Georgios
channel.description: Recent content in unix on I am Georgios

item.title: Vi cheatsheet
item.description: Navigation hjkl: left/up/down/right gg: move to the start of the file Shift+g: move to the end of file w: move to the start of the next word Shift+e: move to the end of the next word Shift+$ move to the end of the line 0 move to the start of the line Actions Esc: Switch to visual mode Text Edit i: Start Editing dd: Delete line Commands help: show vi documentation
